conversations.content: How many appointments do I have today?

<function_thought>
To determine how many appointments Emma Johnson has today, I will first retrieve the current day in ISO format. Then, I will use the current date to fetch the calendar events for that day, which will allow me to count the number of appointments.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_current_day()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
Now that I have the current date as "2024-05-15", I will retrieve the calendar events for today to count the number of appointments.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_day_calendar_events(day="2024-05-15")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
